last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dong-mi spills the truth in front of Yu-sin. Blissfully unaware of grim reapers in their home, the newlywed couples bask in their happiness.

name: Love (ft. Marriage and Divorce)
overview: Everything comes unraveling for three successful women who work on a radio show as twists, turns and troubles plague their seemingly happy marriages.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Everything comes unraveling for three successful women who work on a radio show as twists, turns and troubles plague their seemingly happy marriages.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Emotions boil over as the women learn of their husbands' affairs and confront the distrust plaguing their once-happy marriages.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Sa Pi-young demands that Mo Seo-hyang leave the country. Park Hae-ryun startles Lee Si-eun with an unexpected request to end their marriage.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Si-eun makes a last-ditch effort to save her marriage. Suspicious of Pan Sa-hyeon's late night at the office, Boo Hye-ryung drops in.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Hye-ryung demands answers from an unfaithful Sa-hyeon. Park Hyang-gi's plea tugs at Hae-ryun's heartstrings. Pan Mun-ho reunites with Kim Dong-mi.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: With a sonogram, Sa-hyeon tries to convince his parents to be in favor of his divorce. Dong-mi turns a cold shoulder to Shin Gi-rim's call for help.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Dong-mi's crocodile tears fool both kith and kin at the funeral, especially Shin Yu-sin. Hye-ryung refuses to grant Sa-hyeon a divorce.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Si-eun warns Hae-ryun to keep his affair a secret from their kids. Pi-young notices Yu-sin's increasing devotion toward Dong-mi.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Hyang-gi boldly confronts her father after having a change of heart. Hye-ryung's sudden visit to the emergency room jolts Sa-hyeon back to reality.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Having seen enough, Pi-young puts the brakes on Yu-sin and Dong-mi's close bond. Mun-ho waits for a text message that never comes.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A run-in on the plane reminds Yu-sin of his first encounter with an aspiring model. Sa-hyeon is captivated by an attractive gym-goer.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Yu-sin lies about his airplane seatmate. Hurt by Mun-ho's apathy, So Ye-jeong packs her bags in a huff. A new professor dazzles Hae-ryun.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Concerned about A-mi's hangover, Yu-sin drops off food before work. Sa-hyeon and Song Won exchange numbers over breakfast.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A-mi confesses her feelings for Yu-sin before a trip back home. Sa-hyeon treats Won to dinner, where she tearfully opens up about her hardships.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A-mi's lonely birthday turns into a romantic night with Yu-sin. Sa-hyeon finds himself comparing Won's warm personality with Hye-ryung's cold attitude.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Sa-hyeon and Won comfort each other about past and present marital issues. Hae-ryun accompanies Nam Ga-bin to the hospital.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Promising to stay by Won's side, Sa-hyeon proposes a new kind of relationship. Hae-ryun jumps at the chance to make a house call for Ga-bin.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Ga-bin yearns for Hae-ryun's warm embrace to mend her broken heart. Won bares her soul to Sa-hyeon, who's set on filing for divorce.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Everything comes unraveling for three successful women who work on a radio show as twists, turns and troubles plague their seemingly happy marriages.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Won, Ga-bin and A-mi open up to each other about their relationships. Hye-ryung turns to her in-laws to get her marriage back on track.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The housekeeper tells an incredulous Dong-mi about seeing the late Gi-rim in the home. Sa-hyeon introduces Won to his mother.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Won and Sa-hyeon tearfully agree to call it quits. Using her husband's apparition as an excuse, Dong-mi moves into Yu-sin's home.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Mun-ho insists on meeting the mother of his future grandchild himself. Hae-ryun reveals his girlfriend's identity to a pained Si-eun.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Si-eun and Ga-bin meet face-to-face as Hyang-gi eavesdrops nearby. On a movie set, an actor wearing a familiar-looking coat catches Pi-young's eye.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Yu-sin puts an expiration date on his relationship with A-mi. Si-eun has bad news for Pi-young: a warning about her husband's possible infidelity.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Pi-young asks Yu-sin about the woman he was seen with at the equestrian club. Won, Sa-hyeon and Hye-ryung unexpectedly cross paths at a restaurant.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A fuming Hye-ryung grills Won about the affair. Hearing of her mother's condition, Pi-young rushes to the hospital... and sees Yu-sin in A-mi's room.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Pi-young is rendered speechless by her husband's betrayal. Ga-bin introduces Hae-ryun to A-mi, whom he recognizes from the equestrian club.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Devastated and determined, Pi-young presents Yu-sin with an ultimatum: Take her to A-mi's house, or go to the courthouse to file divorce papers.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A-mi's meeting with her biological father goes sour when questions arise about a mutual acquaintance. Yu-sin packs up his bags to give Pi-young space.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Yu-sin pleads for a second chance while Pi-young recounts how his unforgivable infidelity robbed her of a parting moment with her mother.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Hye-ryung gives Sa-hyeon her blessing. A-mi offers her friendship to Pi-young and proves to be a formidable opponent for Dong-mi.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Ga-bin shares devastating news with Seo Dong-ma. Hye-ryung's tearful press conference turns the public against Sa-hyeon.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Yu-sin feels betrayed seeing his ex-wife out with another man. Hye-ryung surprises co-workers with her feelings for Ban. Dong-ma stays by Ga-bin's side.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Yu-sin finds reasons to frequent Pi-young's apartment. Ga-bin's recent loss gives her a realization about marriage. Won goes into labor.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Emotions boil over as the women learn of their husbands' affairs and confront the distrust plaguing their once-happy marriages.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Won goes into labor with Sa-hyeon by her side. Dong-mi invites Ji-a over for a delicious meal, secretly hoping that she'll run into A-mi inside.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A possessed Ji-a goes after Dong-mi. Joy is short-lived for Sa-hyeon’s family as tragedy strikes moments after the baby’s birth.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After taking a walk down memory lane with Si-eun, Seo Ban confesses his feelings for his longtime crush. Hye-ryung finds an excuse to visit Ban's home.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Si-eun wishes Ban a happy birthday with an outdoor picnic for two. Meanwhile, Hye-ryung prepares a surprise party with Pi-young's help.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Feeling deceived by the new couple, Hye-ryung pushes Si-eun for an explanation. Dong-ma follows his heart and takes Pi-young out to dinner.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The night before a month-long business trip, Dong-ma initiates a whirlwind romance with Pi-young with a confession, proposal and an amusement park date.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: After regaining his health, Hae-ryun sets out to also get back his family. Ji-a learns of her parents' divorce and witnesses her father with A-mi.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ban takes Si-eun and her kids on a ski getaway. Dong-ma rushes back from Germany in time for a romantic Christmas Eve with Pi-young.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Hae-ryun states his objection to Si-eun's remarriage, and Ban's father gathers with Si-eun's family for a meal. Meanwhile, Ji-a agrees to meet Dong-ma.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A noticeably different Hye-ryung appears in front of Sa-hyeon’s family. Hae-ryun tries to convince Hyang-gi and U-ram to live with him.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Hye-ryung and Sa-hyeon give their marriage another try. Soon after Dong-ma tells his father about Pi-young, tragedy falls upon the Seo family.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Mun-ho and Ye-jeong suspect Hye-ryung might be possessed. When Yu-sin finds out about Pi-young's remarriage, Dong-ma reaches out to meet face to face.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A clairvoyant guest is invited to see if Hye-ryung is truly possessed. Ban and Si-eun walk down the aisle. Dong-mi makes a startling confession to A-mi.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Hye-ryung returns to her previous self after an exorcism separates her from Won. Pi-young shares joyful news with Dong-ma on their wedding night.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Ga-bin yearns for Hae-ryun's warm embrace to mend her broken heart. Won bares her soul to Sa-hyeon, who's set on filing for divorce.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Dong-mi spills the truth in front of Yu-sin. Blissfully unaware of grim reapers in their home, the newlywed couples bask in their happiness.
